Text: Abo-i la chʼabo ku ma dʼoji dufu unyi unyi-ma, o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu abo ku ma kwo Babilo̩n te̩gu lebʼumi ef o̩kpanachi onu Artaze̩rksis la jo̩-i:
ef amo̩ma Finehas, Ge̩rshom le. Ef amo̩ma Itamar, Danie̩l, ef amo̩ma Defid, Hatush,
ef amo̩ma She̩kanaya, ef amo̩ma Paro̩sh, Ze̩karaya; oñ abo ku ma le bʼo̩ ku ma lo o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-ma che aboke̩le̩ oli me̩ta.
Ef amo̩ma Pahut-moab, E̩liehoenai o̩ma Ze̩rahaya le; oñ aboke̩le̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ ño̩ lebʼo̩.
Ef amo̩ma She̩kanaya, o̩ma Jaha-zie̩l; aboke̩le̩ oli me̩fa la lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Edin, Ebe̩d, o̩ma Jo̩natan; oñ aboke̩le̩ ooje lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Elam, Je̩shaya, o̩ma Atalaya; oñ aboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Shefatia, Ze̩badaya, o̩ma Maike̩l; aboke̩le̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩le̩ lebʼo̩.
Ef amo̩ma Joab, O̩badaya, o̩ma Je̩hie̩l; aboke̩le̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩jo̩ la lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma She̩lomit, o̩ma Jo̩se̩-faya; aboke̩le̩ o̩gbo̩ me̩jo̩ la lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Bebai, Ze̩karaya, o̩ma Bebai; aboke̩le̩ ogu nyoke me̩jo̩ lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Azgad, Johanan, o̩ma Hakatan; aboke̩le̩ ogu me̩lu nyoke me̩gwa lebʼo̩.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Adonikam otitala, odu-ma jo̩-i: Elife̩le̩t kpai Jeue̩l kpai Shamaya; aboke̩le̩ o̩gbo me̩ta lebʼuma.
Oñ ef amo̩ma Bigfai, Utai kpai Zabud; aboke̩le̩ e̩te̩gwa la lebʼuma.
Tak u ko ma jʼugboʼkate o̩la aji ki acha nyʼAhafa; o̩mo̩ a la ru jo̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta. Tak u fʼamone̩ le̩ ma kpai amatama, oñ u li ka kʼo̩ma Lifai du dʼef uma n.

Tak u kpʼone̩ ado̩ E̩lieza kpai Arie̩l kpai She̩maya kpai E̩lnetan kpai Jarib kpai E̩lnetan kpai Netan kpai Ze̩karaya kpai Me̩shulam, abo ku ma dʼoji dufu; kpai Jo̩yarib, kpai E̩lnetan ge̩, ku ma chʼabo ku ma ma ojie̩wñ.

Tak u fʼuma kpe̩ nyʼugbo Ido kʼi dʼoji dufu ugboʼka ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kasifia; tak u ka ñwu ma alu ku ama aka ñw Ido kpai amo̩maye-wñ ku ma chʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, ugbo ku ma do̩ ko̩ Kasifia le̩, kʼama ki ko abo ku ma che e̩wñ wa, tod unyi O̩jo̩-wa.
Oñ alu kʼo̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩-wa nʼuwa oji ma dʼe̩ne̩ʼka ki nʼibe ef uma ñw a ef amo̩ma Mali, o̩ma Lifai, o̩ma Israe̩l; kpai She̩re̩baya manyʼamo̩ma-wñ kpai amo̩maye-wñ, one̩ me̩gwe̩jo̩;
kpai Ha-shabia, oñ Je̩shaya ef amo̩ma Me̩rari, kpai amo̩maye-wñ kpai amo̩ma-ma manyʼu, one̩ ogu;
oñ ef abo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩, e-ki Defid kpai amagboji kowa ku ma che e̩wñ ñw abo Lifai, ma chʼabo uko̩lo̩ unyi O̩jo̩ o̩gwo̩ko̩ nyʼo̩gbo̩lo̩: ma fʼodu e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma do̩ chaka.
Tak u fʼakoya alu eji ta o̩la aji Ahafa le̩, kʼawa ki hio̩la-wa wane̩ o̩gba O̩jo̩-wa, todu kʼawa ki tʼe ene o̩na kpoolo todu wa kpai amegini-wa, kpai e̩wñ-wa du kʼa ne̩.

Todu anyo̩ je̩ ñwu mi tʼonu ene kʼi kʼuche̩ amisoja kpai amananya wa ku ma te̩ko wa ugbo ame̩nebi-wa ej o̩na n, todabu kʼa ka ñw onu kakini, O̩wo̩ e̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩-wa anʼoji abo du ku ma tene owñ; ukpahiu-wñ kpai uwe̩do̩-wñ muda dʼoji abo du ku ma hiʼu tinyo̩.
Abe̩le̩ a kwojalu, oñ a gbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩-wa todu e̩wñ-i; i la mʼomu-wa gbagbo̩.
Tak u mʼagboji amatama me̩gwe-ji chi jʼane̩, owñ che She̩re̩baya kpai Hashabaya kpʼamo̩maye-ma me̩ gwa manyu ma.

Oñ u fʼajifa kpʼo̩jamalia kpai e̩wrñ eku le̩ ñwa nyʼuma o̩wo̩, owñ chʼe̩wñ ku ma ko ne ate̩ tod unyi O̩jo̩-wa, owñ che e-kʼonu kpʼabo̩hiala-wñ, kpʼamagboji-wñ, kpʼabo Israe̩l du kʼeju-ma dʼane̩ o̩mo̩ muko wa le̩.
U fʼajifa tale̩nt oli me̩gwe̩ta, kpʼe̩wñ eku ku ma nʼajifa che alu tale̩nt ogume̩-lu ñwa nyʼuma o̩wo̩; e-o̩jamalia che tale̩nt o̩gume̩lu.
Ugba o̩jamalia ogu alu darik icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩; kpʼe̩wñ eku meji ku ma ne̩ ebije ekpikpa kʼi ade̩ ñaña, kʼaja-wñ kpuna dab o̩jamalia, che.
Tak u ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ afo̩ ñwu Jihofa, e̩wñ eku le̩ du ñʼafo̩ ge̩; ajifa kpai o̩jamalia le̩ la che e̩wñ ku ma gʼe̩do̩la-ma kowa ñwu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-amata-me̩.
Me̩ fʼu de̩, me̩ la dejutʼo̩, gbogbo wʼe̩gba ku ma fʼu ñwa eju amagboji amatama kpai abo Lifai kpai amagboji amo̩ra abo Israe̩l Je̩rusale̩m, ef e̩ko̩da unyi unyi ejefu unyi Jihofa.
Abe̩le̩ amatama kpai abo Lifai mʼadu ajifa kpʼo̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ eku le̩ gba, ku ma ko wa jʼef unyi O̩jo̩-wa Je̩rusale̩m.
Tak a kwo bʼo̩la ohimini Ahafa te̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩gweji ochu ejodudu kʼa nyi Je̩rusale̩m; o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩-wa la dʼoji-wa, oñ i mʼuwa gba bʼo̩wo̩ ame̩nebi kpʼabo ku ma kpala jo̩ ej o̩na le̩ te̩.
Tak a lewa Je̩rusale̩m, oñ a je̩ o̩jo̩ me̩ta o̩mo̩.

Tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩-wñ ma fʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia kpʼe̩wñ eku le̩ ñwa o̩j e̩bo̩ ef unyi O̩jo̩-wa, (ma mʼu ko) nyu Me̩re̩-mo̩t, kʼi chʼo̩ma Uraya atama le̩, o̩wo̩; E̩le̩aza, o̩ma Finehas, la dʼugbo-wñ; Jozabad, o̩ma Je̩shua, kpai Noadaya o̩ma Binui, abo Lifai, la manyʼuma.
O̩gbo̩-wñ du chʼenaluka kpai alu kʼuwoji-wñ de̩; ma fʼuwoji-wñ chaka ko̩ iko le̩.

Amo̩ma abo ku ma mu, ku ma kwʼugbo ku ma mu ma nyi wa le̩, ma ko e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo wa che O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, amo̩kokuno̩ tod abo Israe̩l chaka chʼe̩gweji, amokolo chʼo̩gbo me̩le̩ nyoke me̩gwe̩fa, amo̩ma la chʼe̩te̩gwa nyoke mebie, amobuko̩ tod iche̩bo̩ adure chʼe̩gweji; e̩wñ-i du chʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo ñwu Jihofa.
Ma ño̩ mʼo̩da, o̩da kʼonu ko̩ ko ñw amisatrap onu kpʼamigo̩bina udaba ohimini le̩; oñ abo le̩ kwote̩ko amone̩ le̩ kpai unyi O̩jo̩ ge̩.
